com.meltmedia.cadmium.cli
Class AbstractAuthorizedOnly

java.lang.Object
  com.meltmedia.cadmium.cli.AbstractAuthorizedOnly
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthorizedOnly
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckGithubTokenCommand, CloneCommand, CommitCommand, DeployCommand, HistoryCommand, MaintenanceCommand, RevertCommand, StatusCommand, UndeployCommand, UpdateCommand
public class AbstractAuthorizedOnly
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthorizedOnly

Implements functionality to facilitate authentication to Cadmium rest endpoints.

Author:
John McEntire, Christian Trimble

getSecureBaseUrl

protected java.lang.String getSecureBaseUrl(java.lang.String siteUrl)
Converts the passed in siteUrl to be https if not already or not local.

Parameters:
siteUrl - The url of a cadmium site.
Returns:
The passed in siteUrl or the same url but converted to https.

isAuthQuiet

public boolean isAuthQuiet()
Tells the CadmiumCli instance that this command should silence the authentication and just fail if not authorized.

Specified by:
isAuthQuiet in interface AuthorizedOnly
Returns:
true if the authentication should not prompt for a username and password.
